activities.name: Schema Discovery From Databricks
activities.description: Discover all tables with DELTA data source format in the specified catalog (database) and schema.

query.value:
WITH table_metadata AS (
  SELECT
    table_catalog as table_catalog,
    table_schema as table_schema,
    table_name as table_name,
    to_json(
      named_struct(
        'metadata_version', 1,
        'container_name', '@{variables('CONTAINER_NAME')}',
        'catalog_path', '@{variables('DELTA_PATH')}',
        'table_path', storage_sub_directory
      )
    ) as metadata
  FROM
    @{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_DATABASE}.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
  WHERE
    LOWER(TABLE_CATALOG) = LOWER('@{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_DATABASE}') 
    AND LOWER(TABLE_SCHEMA) = LOWER('@{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_SCHEMA}')
)
SELECT
  'DATABRICKS' AS dataset,
  t.TABLE_CATALOG AS specified_database,
  t.TABLE_SCHEMA AS specified_schema,
  t.TABLE_NAME AS identified_table,
  c.COLUMN_NAME AS identified_column,
  c.DATA_TYPE AS identified_column_type,
  CASE
    WHEN c.FULL_DATA_TYPE LIKE 'varchar%' THEN substring(c.FULL_DATA_TYPE,9, POSITION(')' IN c.FULL_DATA_TYPE) - POSITION('(' IN c.FULL_DATA_TYPE) -1) 
    WHEN c.FULL_DATA_TYPE = 'string' THEN 500
    ELSE -1
  END AS identified_column_max_length,
  c.ORDINAL_POSITION AS ordinal_position,
  m.metadata AS metadata
FROM
  @{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_DATABASE}.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES t
  JOIN @{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_DATABASE}.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS c
    ON t.table_catalog = c.table_catalog AND t.table_schema = c.table_schema AND t.table_name = c.table_name
  JOIN table_metadata m
    ON t.table_catalog = m.table_catalog AND t.table_schema = m.table_schema AND t.table_name = m.table_name
WHERE
  t.table_catalog = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_DATABASE}' AND t.table_schema = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_SCHEMA}' AND t.data_source_format = 'DELTA';

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT
    specified_database,
    specified_schema,
    identified_table,
    metadata
FROM @{pipeline().parameters.P_METADATA_SCHEMA}.@{pipeline().parameters.P_METADATA_RULESET_TABLE}
WHERE LOWER(specified_schema) = LOWER('@{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_SCHEMA}')
AND LOWER(specified_database) = LOWER('@{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_DATABASE}')
AND dataset = 'DATABRICKS'

transformations.description: Add a DELPHIX_COMPLIANCE_SERVICE_RANDOM_ID column, which is generated via the `random` expression. The current timestamp in milliseconds is used as the seed for the number generation.

transformations.description: Sort the sample rows based on the randomly generated IDs.

transformations.name: CreateFinalSelectionId
transformations.description: Add a DELPHIX_COMPLIANCE_SERVICE_FINAL_SELECTION_ID column that increments by 1 and starts at 1. It is incremented in order of the DELPHIX_COMPLIANCE_SERVICE_RANDOM_ID added previously.
